title: polygon stuck on Execution of 1 block for 11 days, nonce too low
body:
#### System information

erigon version 2.47.0-dev-5dd6b77e

OS & Version: Linux Ubuntu 20.04

Commit hash: 5dd6b77e40993bd8b13c933bc1f1f54b28e5e33a

Erigon Command (with flags/config): /usr/sbin/erigon --bodies.cache=2G --chain=bor-mainnet --datadir=/var/lib/erigon --downloader.disable.ipv6 --downloader.verify=true --graphql --healthcheck --http.addr=xxxx --http.api=eth,erigon,web3,net,txpool,ots,debug,trace,admin,parity,bor --http.corsdomain=xxxx --http.vhosts=* --lightclient.discovery.addr=xxxx --metrics --nat 'extip:xxxx' --private.api.addr=xxxx:9090 --torrent.download.rate 512mb --torrent.upload.rate 512mb --ws --p2p.protocol=66,67,68 --metrics.port 6061 --db.size.limit=7TB

Concensus Layer: heimdalld 0.3.4

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config): /usr/bin/heimdalld start --home /var/lib/heimdall --chain mainnet --chain-id heimdall-137 --rest-server

Chain/Network: 137 / polygon mainnet

#### Expected behaviour

Everything is fine, execution processes until HEAD then goes to step 8 and more
